sentences.en: A new battleship was launched from a shipyard.
sentences.cn: 一艘新战舰从船坞下水.

sentences.en: Behind the Major was a desk as big as a battleship.
sentences.cn: 少校身后是一张大得象战舰那样的办公桌.

sentences.en: Cruiser sized modules will no longer drop in Serpentis battleship wrecks.
sentences.cn: 天蛇战列舰将不再掉落适合巡洋舰使用的装备.

sentences.en: I am standing at the helm of a High Guard battleship orbiting your planet.
sentences.cn: 我现在站在绕你们行星旋转的战舰上.

sentences.en: If he had a home in the world, it was a battleship.
sentences.cn: 要说他在这个世界上有个家的话, 那就是一艘战舰.

sentences.en: It cannot be said that air attack has rendered the battleship obsolete.
sentences.cn: 不能说飞机的攻击淘汰了战列舰.

sentences.en: Later air reconnaissance showed that the battleship was heavily damaged.
sentences.cn: 事后,空中侦察表明,该战列舰受伤颇重.

sentences.en: Our battleship was assigned to convoy an aircraft carrier to the Sea.
sentences.cn: 我们的战舰奉命为一艘航空母舰护航到加勒比海.

sentences.en: Shogun Battleship damage reduction, and FX change at shells fired, 10 % larger.
sentences.cn: 将军战列舰的伤害减少, 开火的特效变化, 体型增大10%.

sentences.en: The German battleship, plastered from three directions, found the British attack too hot.
sentences.cn: 这艘德国战舰处在三面夹攻之中, 感到英国战舰的攻势过于猛烈.

sentences.en: The little boy enjoys making battleship models.
sentences.cn: 这个小男孩喜欢做战舰模型.

sentences.en: The new battleship shall be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.cn: 新战舰将以16英寸口径的大炮武装起来。

sentences.en: The new battleship will be armed with 16 - inch guns.
sentences.cn: 那艘战舰将装备16英寸口径的大炮.

sentences.en: The old battleship has been in commission for more than twenty years.
sentences.cn: 这艘旧战舰已服役20多年了.

sentences.en: They moved two destroyers into the area to counter the threat from the enemy battleship.
sentences.cn: 他们开了两艘驱逐舰进入这个地区,来反击敌人战舰的威胁.

sentences.en: This kind of battleship is assembled with big guns.
sentences.cn: 这种战舰装备着大型火炮.

trans.tran_en: the largest type of ship used in war, with very big guns and heavy  armour
